title: MERS-CoV Infection of Alpaca in a Region Where MERS-CoV is Endemic
body: Technical Appendix Table. Overview of background data and study results of alpaca and dromedary cohorts. ‡S1 microarray titers. Titers were defined as the interpolated serum concentration that provoked a response half-way on a concentration-response curve between the minimum and maximum signal and were calculated from the inflection point of a 4-step dilution series (1:20 to 1:1280), as previously described (1). §Results RT-PCR targeting MERS-CoV UpE gene.
